## Workshop Registration

Register for our upcoming events using the form below.

```{=html}
<form id="eventRegistrationForm" style="max-width: 500px; margin: 20px 0;">
  
  <div style="margin-bottom: 15px;">
    <label for="fullName" style="display: block; margin-bottom: 5px; font-weight: bold;">Full Name *</label>
    <input type="text" id="fullName" required style="width: 100%; padding: 8px; border: 1px solid #ddd; border-radius: 4px; box-sizing: border-box;">
  </div>

  <div style="margin-bottom: 15px;">
    <label for="email" style="display: block; margin-bottom: 5px; font-weight: bold;">Email Address *</label>
    <input type="email" id="email" required style="width: 100%; padding: 8px; border: 1px solid #ddd; border-radius: 4px; box-sizing: border-box;">
  </div>

  <div style="margin-bottom: 15px;">
    <label for="phone" style="display: block; margin-bottom: 5px; font-weight: bold;">Phone Number</label>
    <input type="tel" id="phone" style="width: 100%; padding: 8px; border: 1px solid #ddd; border-radius: 4px; box-sizing: border-box;">
  </div>

  <div style="margin-bottom: 15px;">
    <label for="organization" style="display: block; margin-bottom: 5px; font-weight: bold;">Organization</label>
    <input type="text" id="organization" style="width: 100%; padding: 8px; border: 1px solid #ddd; border-radius: 4px; box-sizing: border-box;">
  </div>

  <div style="margin-bottom: 15px;">
    <label for="workshop" style="display: block; margin-bottom: 5px; font-weight: bold;">Workshop of Interest *</label>
    <select id="workshop" required style="width: 100%; padding: 8px; border: 1px solid #ddd; border-radius: 4px; box-sizing: border-box;">
      <option value="">-- Select a workshop --</option>
      <option value="Spatial Analysis">Spatial Analysis Fundamentals</option>
      <option value="Land Cover">Land Cover Mapping & Change Detection</option>
      <option value="Coastal Management">Coastal Ecosystem Management</option>
      <option value="Marine Spatial Planning">Marine Spatial Planning Basics</option>
      <option value="Data Visualization">Data Visualization for Decision Making</option>
      <option value="Other">Other/General Interest</option>
    </select>
  </div>

  <button type="submit" style="background-color: #3498db; color: white; padding: 10px 20px; border: none; border-radius: 4px; cursor: pointer; font-size: 16px; font-weight: bold; width: 100%;">
    Register Now
  </button>

  <div id="successMessage" style="display: none; margin-top: 20px; padding: 15px; background-color: #d4edda; color: #155724; border: 1px solid #c3e6cb; border-radius: 4px;">
    âœ“ Thank you for registering! Your information has been saved. We'll contact you with event details.
  </div>
</form>

<script>
document.getElementById('eventRegistrationForm').addEventListener('submit', function(e) {
  e.preventDefault();
  
  const fullName = document.getElementById('fullName').value;
  const email = document.getElementById('email').value;
  const workshop = document.getElementById('workshop').value;
  
  if (!fullName || !email || !workshop) {
    alert('Please fill in all required fields (marked with *)');
    return;
  }
  
  // Save to browser storage
  const registrations = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('msp_registrations') || '[]');
  registrations.push({
    name: fullName,
    email: email,
    phone: document.getElementById('phone').value || 'Not provided',
    organization: document.getElementById('organization').value || 'Not provided',
    workshop: workshop,
    timestamp: new Date().toLocaleString()
  });
  localStorage.setItem('msp_registrations', JSON.stringify(registrations));
  
  // Show success message
  document.getElementById('successMessage').style.display = 'block';
  document.getElementById('eventRegistrationForm').reset();
  
  console.log('Registration saved:', { fullName, email, workshop });
});
</script>
```

## Frequently Asked Questions

**Q: What should I bring to a workshop?**
A: Please bring a laptop with R or Python installed. We'll provide all datasets and materials.

**Q: Is there a registration fee?**
A: Most workshops are free for participants from partner institutions.

**Q: How long are workshops?**
A: Workshops typically run 2-4 hours depending on the topic.

**Q: Do you provide certificates?**
A: Yes, completion certificates are provided for all workshops.

**Q: Can I attend remotely?**
A: Some workshops are held in person at SOAF-UDSM, while others are online. Details provided upon registration.
